bibl.title: Notes on Some Alexandrian demotics.
bibl.note: The demotic was the official designation of Alexandrian citizens, both in their home town and in the Egyptian "chora".

bibl.title: Alessandria e il Mondo ellenistico-romano. Studi in onore di Achille Adriani. I

bibl.seg: Clarysse Willy and Wilfried Swinnen, Notes on Some Alexandrian demotics.
Alessandria e il Mondo ellenistico-romano. Studi in onore di Achille Adriani. I (Roma, 1983) pp. 13-15.
The demotic was the official designation of Alexandrian citizens, both in their home town and in the Egyptian "chora".
